name: Misha

traceMaterials.itemName: Past Evils of the Borehole Planet Disaster

story: A well-behaved boy serving as a hotel doorman in Penacony.Misha has a great longing for the Nameless and dreams of one day embarking on his own journey.

skills.name: Please... Step Aside!
skills.description: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Room... Room Service!
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to an enemy and minor Ice DMG to enemies adjacent to it. In addition, Misha's next Ultimate strikes more times.

skills.name: I... I'm Late!
skills.description: Deals minor Ice DMG to an enemy. The attack bounces among enemies #1[i] times by default and up to a maximum of #5[i] times. Each bounce has a small chance to Freeze the target.

skills.name: Grappling Mechanism
skills.description: Whenever an ally consumes a Skill Point, Misha's next Ultimate strikes more times and Misha regenerates his Energy.

skills.name: Wait! You Are So Beautiful!
skills.description: Creates a dimension that stops all enemies within. Upon entering battle against enemies within the dimension, Misha's next Ultimate strikes more times.

eidolons.name: Ethereal Phantom
eidolons.description: When using the Ultimate, for each enemy in battle, the Ultimate strikes enemies over 1 more hits, up to a maximum of 5 more hits.

eidolons.name: Melancholy of Youth
eidolons.description: Each hit of the Ultimate has a 24% base chance to reduce the target's DEF by 16% for 3 turn(s) before dealing damage.

eidolons.name: Shadow of Joy
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Friendly Faces
eidolons.description: Increases the DMG multiplier of Ultimate's each hit by 6%.

eidolons.name: Initial Love and Friendship
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Longings of Yore
eidolons.description: Using the Ultimate enables this character to deal 30% more damage until the end of the turn. In addition, using the next Skill recovers 1 Skill Points for all allies.
